This fixes a NullPointerException in contacts ContentProvider on HTC
devices

Fix #110: Disable push notifications preference if GCM is not available

Resend message: reset security flags as well (fixes #131)

Seems that NULL is indeed a special value in SQL

Including a condition check for NULL in the phone query.

Signed-off-by: Daniele Ricci <daniele.athome@gmail.com>

Invalidate contact cache after receiving vCard

Signed-off-by: Daniele Ricci <daniele.athome@gmail.com>

Test and fix chat invitation UI (closes #72)

Also proper notification support and other fixes

Signed-off-by: Daniele Ricci <daniele.athome@gmail.com>

Fix #96: do not send push registration ID with initial presence

GCM registration is triggered after login anyway, so there is no need
to send push registration ID in initial presence. It will be changed
anyway with the incoming XEP which will use IQ stanzas.

Signed-off-by: Daniele Ricci <daniele.athome@gmail.com>

Fix #140: show actual send timestamp also in message details

Fix #1: retain fragment instance on configuration change (??)

This is probably an Android support library bug (or misinterpretation).

Signed-off-by: Daniele Ricci <daniele.athome@gmail.com>
